story:
What is Bitcoin? Why do you care about it?

Bitcoin is the world's most important digital currency. In the short span of 8 years, it's grown from the utopian project of a few users to a system that's moved more than 120 billion dollars.

Twenty-one million — that is the total number of bitcoins that will ever exist. Sixteen million have already been claimed. You in for the rest of this story?

The Book

This is an entry level book, so anyone with an interest can understand it. If you're already into Bitcoin, this might be the perfect gift for those around you that are just getting to know it. 

We think technology subjects have great potential to become visual books. Smart and beautiful can go together in your library, office or coffee table!

Rewards

The book is the main objective, so we want to keep it simple in terms of rewards. We want to create a beautifully produced object, so focusing on a single product allows us to put all the care and money into it.

The NapkinBooks Concept

Explain it to me on a napkin. That's the idea.

We love the power of sketches and doodles. We love napkin drawings because they're simple, direct & unpretentious. We love it when people who understand something complicated can reach out to us and explain it in clear, fun, inspiring ways. For these reasons, we created NapkinBooks.

Technology is changing our world, and we want to see more people of all ages and backgrounds understanding the principles of software, the internet and digital currencies. When people understand they can form their own ideas and participate. Just as we participate in business or politics without being economists or politicians, we should be participating in a tech-driven world.

The Authors

A project by Daniel and Federico. We're friends who've been working together for the past 6 years on projects like story-telling software, apps for lyrics lovers and digital experiences on physical spaces.

For this book we've invited illustrator Daniela Hoyos to help us turn our messy sketches into beautiful drawings & Juan Sebastian as general advisor and proofreader. 

Product Specs

 

Risks & Challenges

We've shipped products -from software to books- consistently over the last five years, so we're confident we'll turn this into a reality. This is our first crowdfunded campaign, and we're eager to make this project as good as it can be with the participation of the backers.

We believe clarity and resourcefulness are key to a project's success. If something unexpected were to happen that required a change of plans, we will be sure to tell you about it as soon & as straight as we can.

We're working directly with the printers to ensure high quality. The books will be approved based on proof copies to verify colours, materials and construction. In case something doesn't live up to our standards, we will try to fix it while minimizing delays.

As any other publishing venture, we also face the challenges of distribution. We've selected a partner with crowdfunding experience to make sure things run as smoothly as possible.

story:
Hello all! My name is Malachi Bailey and I am a newly-minted author! Woot woot, lol. Last June, I released my debut novel, HER, which has changed my life! I’ve always been a storyteller, bookworm, and nerd from as far back as I can remember. I am unapologetic and unwavering in these interests! After much thought, I decided to re-release the book. New cover and more editing was needed to properly convey this story. I want to do it justice and give it the respect it deserves. And if you find it in your heart (and wallets) to help me achieve this dream re-tweaked, then I would be forever in your debt!

I’ve started the process of looking for the perfect editor to help make HER rise to stardom! But as you may or may not know editors do NOT work on hopes and dreams. They need the “green stuff”. A substantial sum of it too! Frankly, I don’t have it. I’m a “struggling artist”. And once the book is properly edited and packaged I can share it with the world again. This time without lingering doubts.


Now here’s what YOU get in return!
• $25 donation = FREE digital copy of HER
• $50 donation = your name in the Acknowledgements
• $100 = You make a cameo in the HER sequel


But guess what? The rewards are cumulative! So if you crank out $175 you get ALL the perks! Cue happy dance and tears of joy!


Seriously though, I realize what I’m asking. I’m asking for your trust and belief in me. I’m asking for a donation to help me achieve a dream I long denied for years. It was not easy birthing this dream of mine. I had to overcome so much. Self-publishing also brought its own set of challenges. In spite of it all, I remain humble, excited, and grateful that you’ve read all of this. I promise you I will not let you down. So, do it for me. Do it for HER.

Still with me? GREAT.  Please please pretty please share this campaign on whatever social media platform you use. Tell your mama. Tell your friends! Let them know that Indiegogo is making this possible! Thanks for your time!

story:
Descripción del proyecto

¿También estás hasta las narices de que jueguen contigo y tus amores parezcan de telenovela? Entonces aporta tu granito para la publicación de mi cuarto libro, dedicado a romper esa dinámica y liberarse de fachadas...

¡Transforma tu vida sentimental a través de la honestidad!

Mi nombre es Sergio Melich, y he dedicado los últimos cinco años de mi vida a un proyecto de desarrollo personal que hace énfasis en la identidad y las relaciones. La Vida es Fluir es el nombre. A través del mismo he organizado distintos programas y servicios (como Alquimia Interior), que han cambiado mi vida por completo y la siguen cambiando con cada nuevo participante.

Esta campaña será para publicar un libro, que llamaré Todo, menos marear.

Este libro nació cuando alguien me hizo llegar una imagen con la frase "hazme lo que quieras, menos perder el tiempo". Tuvo tanto eco en nosotros que la comentamos, y me animé a preguntarle a un montón de personas por lo que les gusta y no les gusta que pase cuando intiman con alguien.

Sorprendentemente, fue mi tía paterna la que me dijo la frase que da título al libro diciendo "ay nene, a mí me gusta todo menos marear".

De ahí para delante, he puesto esta idea como condimento en todas las relaciones y contactos que mantengo... Y gloria bendita, oye. Así las cosas, no pude resistirme a compartirlo en forma de un texto ligero, fácil de leer y todavía más fácil de aplicar. Una apuesta segura.

Te dejo con el vídeo promocional del taller con el que desarrollé plenamente el guión y los contenidos de Todo, menos marear (¡el más reciente!):

Decide ahora y vive hoy una mejor vida sentimental.

En esta obra le damos un repasito desenfadado a la evolución de las relaciones amorosas hasta lo que son hoy... ¡Ese dulce caos tan sabroso y tocapelotas! 

Todos nosotros hemos pensado alguna vez ¿quién me mandaría a mí fijarme en esa persona? -- ¡y con razón! Todos hemos sentido que nos estaban manipulando, que nos hacían el enredo del siglo y no nos veíamos con herramientas, ni con fuerzas para salir de esta situación...

Ahora, todo eso se acabó. Este libro (producto de mis experiencias y de las de mis clientes y amistades) será tu gran arma secreta para no comerte los zarzales y los pedregales que te aparezcan al paso... ¡Sin dejar de avanzar en tu vida!

Por el camino, descubrimos la importancia de tener las cosas claras. Y por supuesto, practicamos juntos maneras para ello, y también distintas formas de ser claro con los demás. No es que por tu cuenta no lo hagas, pero lo más probable es que (como todos, yo incluido) pases un montón de cosas importantes por alto... Tan sólo porque no se te ocurren, o bien porque no te las planteas con bastante profundidad. 

Para solucionarlo, en este libro aparecen tres cuestiones. A saber...

La primera es el enfoque de exposición de alternativas, sin empujarte a escoger ninguna en especial. La segunda es el compendio de actividades para conocerte mejor y expresar partes de tu identidad que no tengan suficiente protagonismo en tu vida. Y la tercera es el programa de 10 semanas al final del libro, que nos hará la vida más sencilla y deliciosa... Con ejercicios para poner en práctica (sin farsas ni pajas mentales) todo lo que te cuenta el libro, y contando además con una comunidad para respaldarte con ello.

Sólo comparto lo más auténtico, positivo y natural que conozco, por principios.

Compruébalo con esta muestra del manuscrito que he colgado en mi web. Si te gusta, recuerda: hay más y mejor en el tintero...

¡Haz conexiones profundas y disfruta de todas tus relaciones!

A lo largo del texto se te anima a encontrar tu proporción única de matices, para darle el mejor sabor a tus experiencias. Además, y como en todos mis proyectos, hacemos esto desde la expresión auténtica de uno mismo.

Desde la libertad y el poder que suponen la honestidad, el ser abiertos y el variar el equilibrio entre ser directos o sutiles, lanzados o tímidos, etc. Tanto da si quieres casarte y tener hijos, ser single y vivir la vida loca, o cualquier cosa entre medio y fuera de estos cauces... Conoce, pon en práctica y disfruta de los resultados.

... Y despídete de los mareos. ¡Así de sencillo! ;)


LAS APORTACIONES Y A QUÉ SE DESTINAN

Para que quede claro, pues algunas personas ignoran completamente los lados de las webs que leen para evitar la publicidad... Colocaré aquí las distintas cantidades (que figuran también a la derecha de la página, junto a estas palabras) y las recompensas que obtienes a cambio de cada una.

De menor a mayor, son estas (nótese que son acumulativas):

  • Un café para el autor. (2€) — ¡Tu nombre aparecerá en los agradecimientos del libro y de la web!

  • ¡A la vanguardia! (6€) — Recibirás una copia digital antes de la salida definitiva del libro.
  • Una copia firmada, por favor. (17€) — Una copia impresa firmada en tu nombre o en el de quien tú quieras, tras publicar el libro. Gastos de envío incluidos para la península ibérica.
  • De dos en dos me gusta más... (25€) — Pues que sean dos copias impresas, firmadas en tu nombre o en el de quien tú quieras, tras publicar el libro.
  • Codo con codo. (48€) — Una copia impresa firmada en tu nombre o en el de quien tú quieras, tras publicar el libro; además de Seguimiento personalizado durante las 10 semanas del programa que incluye el libro. Gastos de envío incluidos para la península ibérica.
  • Debemos aplicar... (100€) — Una invitación gratuita a un taller en vivo, o plaza gratis en el seminario online. Tres copias del libro firmadas en tu nombre o en el de quien tú quieras, tras publicar el libro.
  • Aventura: rumbo al horizonte. (250€) — Te invito a una experiencia de retiro en vivo conmigo. Tú corres con tus propios gastos, por supuesto, pero piensa en ello como una aventura para el cambio. :)
  • Sólo para Sponsors. (400€) — Además de una mención especial como Sponsor en el libro y la web, tendrás una plaza gratuita en cualquier evento y programa que organice, y contaré contigo como beta-tester.
  • ¡Vamos a por todas! (1200€) — ¿Quieres patrocinar el proyecto entero? ¡Excelente, camarada! Además de todo lo anterior, ¡¡tienes un año de mentoring personal conmigo!! Sesiones en vivo y telemáticas (Skype, Hangouts, etc.) a convenir. Y el logotipo de tu empresa o proyecto aparecerá en el libro y en la web, acreditado como patrocinador.

Como estos proyectos pueden llegar a recaudar más de lo previsto inicialmente, os cuento en detalle lo que se hará cuando alcancemos ciertos montos. Todas las cifras han sido calculadas usando las tarifas de la Editorial Círculo Rojo como referencia, puesto que lo editarán ellos.

  • Hitos de publicación: Estas cantidades reflejan el presupuesto que ha realizado para esta obra la editorial, y distintos servicios extra que se suman a una mayor cantidad de ejemplares impresos. Yo asumiré los gastos de envío para los mecenas que residan en el territorio peninsular de España (para envíos al extranjero y fuera de la península: por favor, añadid 10 euros al hacer la donación).
  • A partir de los hitos: Todo lo que supere la cantidad de 925 €uros lo usaremos para cubrir gastos de envío (en caso necesario) y contratar servicios de traducción. Si sobrara todavía más, se dedicará al bonus de la escapada de aventura.


CALENDARIO

¡La obra está casi en tus manos! Los lectores beta han quedado encantados, las lectoras beta se están planteando regalárselo a varios chicos que conocen (cosa que me halaga y me hace gracia al mismo tiempo).

Se tomaron en cuenta las aportaciones y todos los comentarios de ellas y de ellos para revisar el manuscrito, que ya está terminado (para asegurar la calidad, suelo dejar reposar lo que escribí, y lo reviso no menos de tres veces).

Y este es el calendario detallado de las acciones que se han realizado hasta ahora, además de fechas orientativas para la entrega de recompensas.

Tenemos que tener en cuenta el plazo de trabajo de la editorial (que consta de entre 30 y 35 días hábiles a partir de la firma del contrato de edición). He aceptado el presupuesto que os he reflejado arriba, y cerraré el contrato en este mes de julio si alcanzamos como mínimo el primero de los tres hitos.

La entrega de las recompensas por aportación puede comenzar prácticamente en cuanto el proceso editorial esté terminado y reciba los ejemplares a firmar.

En el caso de que tu recompensa incluya una copia digital anticipada (o una participación en los programas y servicios que ofrece el equipo); mantente al tanto. Contactaremos contigo para ultimar los detalles que sean precisos.

 

Riesgos y desafíos

Las campañas de este tipo pueden fallar y no alcanzar su objetivo.

De hecho, en Verkami (otra web de crowdfunding catalana que opera desde España) esta misma campaña logró reunir aportes por valor de 571 €uros, con solamente 12 mecenas aportándole. Esta es una segunda oportunidad para llegar a la meta propuesta.

Los mayores obstáculos que enfrenta este proyecto son, sin embargo, las convenciones sociales y culturales que nos impiden llevar una vida sentimental más sencilla, natural y amena... Si bien eso es algo que se enfrenta con la consciencia, el conocimiento de causa y reforzando el poder de tomar decisiones en base a la propia identidad, necesidades y deseos.

  • Para solucionar esto, varias de las aportaciones incluyen plazas en los distintos servicios que ofrece el equipo (talleres presenciales, seminarios online, asesorías, etc.) como refuerzo para los cambios que inicies. Además, en el caso de quienes adquieran el seminario y los talleres, un/a acompañante puede unirse sin costes añadidos.

También destacaría como desafío el colaborar con una editorial externa en vez de seguir recurriendo a la autoedición (como ya hice con otros tres libros anteriormente, que se pueden encontrar en Amazon). No pongo en duda la calidad de su trabajo, pero no podré responder por los plazos del mismo salvo en la medida que ellos mismos se comprometan.

  • Mi plan es contar con vosotros (los interesados de todo el mundo) y con una editorial a la que vender mi libro le aporte beneficios significativos para sacar este proyecto adelante... Pura filosofía ganar-ganar.

Amazon puede venderlos, pero dudo que saque un 0,00001% de su beneficio total con ellos. Por ello deseo acudir a una editorial con la que al menos un amigo ha trabajado ya, y está satisfecho del resultado. ¿Y sobre enviaros el libro firmado, como prometen las recompensas? El envío debería estar cubierto si alcanzamos la cantidad objetivo, al menos dentro de España.


OTRAS FORMAS DE AYUDAR

Algunas personas no pueden contribuir con dinero, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar... Aquí hay varias cosas que también pueden ser útiles:

  • Cualquier habilidad o talento que poseas y quieras aportar al proyecto. Si sabes de diseño gráfico, de traducción (para versiones en otros idiomas), de programación y diseño web o similares; entonces puedes contribuir también. Habla conmigo y arreglamos un acuerdo. ;)

  • ¡Pasa la voz a todo el mundo! Si sientes que nos vendría bien cambiar de aires, no te cortes en hacerle llegar este proyecto a las personas que te importan. También puedes darle un toque de atención a la persona que te marea recomendándole este libro, o regalándoselo incluso... Y por supuesto, comparte la campaña en Facebook, Twitter y demás redes sociales. Esta es, de hecho, la mejor manera en la que puedes ayudar (¡incluso si estás poniendo dinero en la campaña!).

Y para motivarte a compartir la campaña, te presento estas recompensas:


    Considera compartir la campaña en tus redes sociales con los botones al final de la historia de la campaña. Así, el sistema llevará la cuenta de todas vuestras aportaciones y podréis reclamar vuestras recompensas especiales.


    La honestidad es un regalo caro, no lo esperes de gente barata.

    ¿Piensas que he olvidado algo que quieras saber? ¿Tienes alguna duda o curiosidad que no haya satisfecho aquí? ¿Quieres saber más sobre mí y sobre mis proyectos?

    Estoy abierto al contacto y a tomarnos unos cafés incluso. Responderé tus preguntas gustosamente, así que no te cortes en escribirme.

    Y esto es todo, por ahora.

    Para despedirme, te dejo con mi iniciativa más reciente. La serie de vídeos cortos En Cualquier Momento, en los que planteo y contesto una pregunta poderosa o desafiante de la manera más espontánea y breve posible.

    Este es el primero de esos vídeos (así captas un poquito más de mi esencia):

Sorprendentemente, fue mi tía paterna la que me dijo la frase que da
título al libro diciendo "ay nene, a mí me gusta todo menos marear".
De ahí para delante, he puesto esta idea como condimento en todas las relaciones y contactos que mantengo... Y gloria bendita, oye. Así las cosas, no pude resistirme a compartirlo en forma de un texto ligero, fácil de leer y todavía más fácil de aplicar. Una apuesta segura.
Te dejo con el vídeo promocional del taller con el que desarrollé plenamente el guión y los contenidos de Todo, menos marear (¡el más reciente!):

Decide ahora y vive hoy una mejor vida sentimental.
En esta obra le damos un repasito desenfadado a la evolución de las
relaciones amorosas hasta lo que son hoy... ¡Ese dulce caos tan sabroso y tocapelotas! Todos nosotros hemos pensado alguna vez ¿quién me mandaría a mí fijarme en esa persona? -- ¡y con razón! Todos hemos sentido que nos estaban manipulando, que nos hacían el enredo del siglo y no nos veíamos con herramientas, ni con fuerzas para salir de esta situación...
Ahora, todo eso se acabó. Este libro (producto de mis experiencias y de las de mis clientes y amistades) será tu gran arma secreta para no comerte los zarzales y los pedregales que te aparezcan al paso... ¡Sin dejar de avanzar en tu vida!
Por el camino, descubrimos la importancia de tener las cosas claras. Y por supuesto, practicamos juntos maneras para ello, y también distintas formas de ser claro con los demás. No es que por tu cuenta no lo hagas, pero lo más probable es que (como todos, yo incluido) pases un montón de cosas importantes por alto... Tan sólo porque no se te ocurren, o bien porque no te las planteas con bastante profundidad. Para solucionarlo, en este libro aparecen tres cuestiones. A saber...La primera es el enfoque de exposición de alternativas, sin empujarte a escoger ninguna en especial. La segunda es el compendio de actividades para conocerte mejor y expresar partes de tu identidad que no tengan suficiente protagonismo en tu vida. Y la tercera es el programa de 10 semanas al final del libro, que nos hará la vida más sencilla y deliciosa... Con ejercicios para poner en práctica (sin farsas ni pajas mentales) todo lo que te cuenta el libro, y contando además con una comunidad para respaldarte con ello.Sólo comparto lo más auténtico, positivo y natural que conozco, por principios.
Compruébalo con esta muestra del manuscrito que he colgado en mi web. Si te gusta, recuerda: hay más y mejor en el tintero...
¡Haz conexiones profundas y disfruta de todas tus relaciones!
A lo largo del texto se te anima a encontrar tu proporción única de matices, para darle el mejor sabor a tus experiencias. Además, y como en todos mis proyectos, hacemos esto desde la expresión auténtica de uno mismo.
Desde la libertad y el poder que suponen la honestidad, el ser abiertos y el variar el equilibrio entre ser directos o sutiles, lanzados o tímidos, etc. Tanto da si quieres casarte y tener hijos, ser single y vivir la vida loca, o cualquier cosa entre medio y fuera de estos cauces... Conoce, pon en práctica y disfruta de los resultados.
... Y despídete de los mareos. ¡Así de sencillo! ;)

LAS APORTACIONES Y A QUÉ SE DESTINAN
Para que quede claro, pues algunas personas ignoran completamente los lados de las webs que leen para evitar la publicidad... Colocaré aquí las distintas cantidades (que figuran también a la derecha de la página, junto a estas palabras) y las recompensas que obtienes a cambio de cada una.
De menor a mayor, son estas (nótese que son acumulativas):


Un café para el autor. (2€) — ¡Tu nombre aparecerá en los agradecimientos del libro y de la web!


¡A la vanguardia! (6€) — Recibirás una copia digital antes de la salida definitiva del libro.

Una copia firmada, por favor. (17€) — Una copia impresa firmada en tu nombre o en el de quien tú quieras, tras publicar el libro. Gastos de envío incluidos para la península ibérica.

De dos en dos me gusta más... (25€) — Pues que sean dos copias impresas, firmadas en tu nombre o en el de quien tú quieras, tras publicar el libro.

Codo con codo. (48€) — Una copia impresa firmada en tu nombre o en el de quien tú quieras, tras publicar el libro; además de Seguimiento personalizado durante las 10 semanas del programa que incluye el libro. Gastos de envío incluidos para la península ibérica.

Debemos aplicar... (100€) — Una invitación gratuita a un taller en vivo, o plaza gratis en el seminario online. Tres copias del libro firmadas en tu nombre o en el de quien tú quieras, tras publicar el libro.

Aventura: rumbo al horizonte. (250€) — Te invito a una experiencia de retiro en vivo conmigo. Tú corres con tus propios gastos, por supuesto, pero piensa en ello como una aventura para el cambio. :)

Sólo para Sponsors. (400€) — Además de una mención especial como Sponsor en el libro y la web, tendrás una plaza gratuita en cualquier evento y programa que organice, y contaré contigo como beta-tester.

¡Vamos a por todas! (1200€) — ¿Quieres patrocinar el proyecto entero? ¡Excelente, camarada! Además de todo lo anterior, ¡¡tienes un año de mentoring personal conmigo!! Sesiones en vivo y telemáticas (Skype, Hangouts, etc.) a convenir. Y el logotipo de tu empresa o proyecto aparecerá en el libro y en la web, acreditado como patrocinador.
Como estos proyectos pueden llegar a recaudar más de lo previsto inicialmente, os cuento en detalle lo que se hará cuando alcancemos ciertos montos. Todas las cifras han sido calculadas usando las tarifas de la Editorial Círculo Rojo como referencia, puesto que lo editarán ellos.


Hitos de publicación: Estas cantidades reflejan el presupuesto que ha realizado para esta obra la editorial, y distintos servicios extra que se suman a una mayor cantidad de ejemplares impresos. Yo asumiré los gastos de envío para los mecenas que residan en el territorio peninsular de España (para envíos al extranjero y fuera de la península: por favor, añadid 10 euros al hacer la donación).


A partir de los hitos: Todo lo que supere la cantidad de 925 €uros lo usaremos para cubrir gastos de envío (en caso necesario) y contratar servicios de traducción. Si sobrara todavía más, se dedicará al bonus de la escapada de aventura.

CALENDARIO
¡La obra está casi en tus manos! Los lectores beta han quedado encantados, las lectoras beta se están planteando regalárselo a varios chicos que conocen (cosa que me halaga y me hace gracia al mismo tiempo).
Se tomaron en cuenta las aportaciones y todos los comentarios de ellas y de ellos para revisar el manuscrito, que ya está terminado (para asegurar la calidad,  suelo dejar reposar lo que escribí, y lo reviso no menos de tres veces).
Y este es el calendario detallado de las acciones que se han realizado hasta ahora, además de fechas orientativas para la entrega de recompensas.
Tenemos que tener en cuenta el plazo de trabajo de la editorial (que consta de entre 30 y 35 días hábiles a partir de la firma del contrato de edición). He aceptado el presupuesto que os he reflejado arriba, y cerraré el contrato en este mes de julio si alcanzamos como mínimo el primero de los tres hitos.
La entrega de las recompensas por aportación puede comenzar prácticamente en cuanto el proceso editorial esté terminado y reciba los ejemplares a firmar.
En el caso de que tu recompensa incluya una copia digital anticipada (o una participación en los programas y servicios que ofrece el equipo); mantente al tanto. Contactaremos contigo para ultimar los detalles que sean precisos.
 
Riesgos y desafíos
Las campañas de este tipo pueden fallar y no alcanzar su objetivo.
De hecho, en Verkami (otra web de crowdfunding catalana que opera desde España) esta misma campaña logró reunir aportes por valor de 571 €uros, con solamente 12 mecenas aportándole. Esta es una segunda oportunidad para llegar a la meta propuesta.
Los mayores obstáculos que enfrenta este proyecto son, sin embargo, las convenciones sociales y culturales que nos impiden llevar una vida sentimental más sencilla, natural y amena... Si bien eso es algo que se enfrenta con la consciencia, el conocimiento de causa y reforzando el poder de tomar decisiones en base a la propia identidad, necesidades y deseos.

Para solucionar esto, varias de las aportaciones incluyen plazas en los distintos servicios que ofrece el equipo (talleres presenciales, seminarios online, asesorías, etc.) como refuerzo para los cambios que inicies. Además, en el caso de quienes adquieran el seminario y los talleres, un/a acompañante puede unirse sin costes añadidos.
También destacaría como desafío el colaborar con una editorial externa en vez de seguir recurriendo a la autoedición (como ya hice con otros tres libros anteriormente, que se pueden encontrar en Amazon). No pongo en duda la calidad de su trabajo, pero no podré responder por los plazos del mismo salvo en la medida que ellos mismos se comprometan.

Mi plan es contar con vosotros (los interesados de todo el mundo) y con una editorial a la que vender mi libro le aporte beneficios significativos para sacar este proyecto adelante... Pura filosofía ganar-ganar.
Amazon puede venderlos, pero dudo que saque un 0,00001% de su beneficio total con ellos. Por ello deseo acudir a una editorial con la que al menos un amigo ha trabajado ya, y está satisfecho del resultado. ¿Y sobre enviaros el libro firmado, como prometen las recompensas? El envío debería estar cubierto si alcanzamos la cantidad objetivo, al menos dentro de España.

OTRAS FORMAS DE AYUDAR
Algunas personas no pueden contribuir con dinero, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar... Aquí hay varias cosas que también pueden ser útiles:


Cualquier habilidad o talento que poseas y quieras aportar al proyecto. Si sabes de diseño gráfico, de traducción (para versiones en otros idiomas), de programación y diseño web o similares; entonces puedes contribuir también. Habla conmigo y arreglamos un acuerdo. ;)


¡Pasa la voz a todo el mundo! Si sientes que nos vendría bien cambiar de aires, no te cortes en hacerle llegar este proyecto a las personas que te importan. También puedes darle un toque de atención a la persona que te marea recomendándole este libro, o regalándoselo incluso... Y por supuesto, comparte la campaña en Facebook, Twitter y demás redes sociales. Esta es, de hecho, la mejor manera en la que puedes ayudar (¡incluso si estás poniendo dinero en la campaña!).
Y para motivarte a compartir la campaña, te presento estas recompensas:
Considera compartir la campaña en tus redes sociales con los botones al final de la historia de la campaña. Así, el sistema llevará la cuenta de todas vuestras aportaciones y podréis reclamar vuestras recompensas especiales. La honestidad es un regalo caro, no lo esperes de gente barata.
¿Piensas que he olvidado algo que quieras saber? ¿Tienes alguna duda o curiosidad que no haya satisfecho aquí? ¿Quieres saber más sobre mí y sobre mis proyectos?
Estoy abierto al contacto y a tomarnos unos cafés incluso. Responderé tus preguntas gustosamente, así que no te cortes en escribirme.
Y esto es todo, por ahora.
Para despedirme, te dejo con mi iniciativa más reciente. La serie de vídeos cortos En Cualquier Momento, en los que planteo y contesto una pregunta poderosa o desafiante de la manera más espontánea y breve posible.
Este es el primero de esos vídeos (así captas un poquito más de mi esencia):

story:
Hello! I am Regina Pumphrey and I am excited to share my dream with you! 

Ever since I was a young girl I have wanted to be an author.  My love for writing goes back to when I was 8 years old and I would visit my Grandfather during the summer. I would sit on the front porch after supper every evening and listen to his stories. He was such a vivid story teller! I would just sit and absorb all of his stories about his travels, and things he had learned throughout his life. Some stories were so farfetched, I wondered if they were true or fiction!  As I listened, my imagination would run free, allowing me to visualize every detail of the story in my mind, thinking about what the characters looked like! I would often go outside, sit on a swing and look up and wander what trees, flowers, and birds would say if they could talk.  What story would they tell? How awesome would it be to put it all in a book for all to see!?

Now, many years later, I decided to finally put my dream of becoming an author in action by writing my very first book, “Merle the Traveling Girl”.  This book is special to me because I feel I’m honoring my grandfather’s legacy of wonderful storytelling and it allows me to put my imagination to great use by sharing life lessons throughout my book. 

Your donations will help me publish my book in both printed and eBook version. With your help, we can make my dream a reality. Knowing people are willing to help me reach my goals and aspirations to become a published author encourages me to pursue them and do what makes me happy; telling stories. 

I believe you can become whatever you want to be! If you imagine it, it can be yours.

story:
Short Summary

Hi! My name is Anne Connolly and I have been an artist and a teller of stories from the moment I first picked up a crayon! Over the past 30 years I have also tried to inspire students of all ages to work hard, be good and feel strong through the martial art of Tae kwon do. I care deeply about how students learn and I frequently use my artistic and creative skills when I teach. Here's a photo of one of the paintings I made of a giant, life-size prehistoric mammal, so that students could experience just how big the animals were when we cover prehistoric life in Tae kwon do camp.

I have spent my whole adult life trying to help people. Now, I am combining my desire to contribute to the world we live in, with my love of art, literature and education, to create a great series of books to help children learn and educators teach. These entertaining books feature:

  • beautiful illustrations
  • great stories
  • endearing characters
  •  a different academic, early language lesson is embedded very cleverly in each story
  • and, because the heart is as important as the mind, each story has a positive message!
  • Friend me on face book ( https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1000014... ) for updates on how to get the most educational value from each book, background information on each story, when and where I'll be reading the books, the status on publishing and delivery dates, and to help decide which book-cover art we should use and more!
THESE BOOKS ARE AVAILABLE IN RICH, FULL COLOR OR IN BLACK AND WHITE   AS THE BEST COLORING BOOKS EVER!
The black & white editions are:
  • Beautiful hard cover books
  • The Illustrations are already shaded for you so you can just add the color and they'll look great
  • Come with a place for you to sign your name as the colorist next to the author's, to personalize your contribution to the book
  • When you are done you you have a beautiful quality book for your library or as a unique and very personal gift for a child or teacher you love (not just a coloring book that you colored)
  • All the illustrations in the full color editions are done with crayola pencils, so you don't need fancy, expensive pencils to make beautiful colors!
  • FRIEND ME ON FACE BOOK to find out about  things like when, tips on coloring videos etc. will be available to watch and more.

IN BLACK & WHITE, GRAB YOUR BOX OF COLORED PENCILS AND GET TO WORK!

OR READ AND ENJOY THE BOOKS IN RICH, FULL COLOR!

Now that you've discovered these great new books,  share your discovery! EVERYONE LOVES A GOOD STORY! SHARE THE ART! POSITIVE MESSAGES! EDUCATIONAL MERIT and of course, THAT THE BOOKS ARE ALSO AVAILABLE AS THE BEST COLORING BOOKS EVER!
When you buy a book you'll be contributing to the
  • cost of formatting and scanning the books for printing
  • cost of printing the books
  • the computer program (photo-shop or indesign ) to add the text to the illustrations
  • the cost of delivering your books to you
The time frame
  • We have 60 days to raise the capital 
  • It takes about a week to produce the proofs
  • If the proofs are awesome it takes about 5 weeks to print the books
  • Then, we pack the books up and deliver them (This depends on how many books we are shipping, but I'll have lot's of help!)
  • That's if everything happens on schedule, I'll keep you updated on face book (Anne Connolly) if we fall behind or get ahead!
  • If we exceed the funding goal, you'll be supporting new books with awesome stories, beautiful illustrations, positive messages and cleverly embedded educational lessons for children and teachers to enjoy! (Several more stories are already written and  are in the sketchbook design phase) Here are some sketches for a funny story in the design phase, about a herd of hiding Hs!


  • If we don't meet the funding goal, you'll still receive your books on schedule
 BOOK COVER ART FOR THE FIRST 4 BOOKS IN THE SERIES

All the illustrations for the first three books are finished (1st book. The Small Shy S Who Changed the World, 2nd book. Eeeevolve! 3rd book.The Good Llittle G)
All the illustrations for the forth book, X-Quest! are complete as line drawings but need to be shaded and colored. I'm going to try and have the 4th book finished by the end of the fund raiser but it might take a little longer. Because you may have to wait a little longer for X-Quest!, everyone who orders all 4 books will receive a free poster.


REMEMBER, EVERYONE LOVES A GOOD BOOK! SHARE YOU DISCOVERY!

SUPPORT THE SERIES AND WATCH IT GROW IN FULL COLOR AND AS GREAT COLORING BOOKS!

SPREAD THE WORD AND ENJOY YOUR BOOKS!!! THANKS! Anne Connolly's awesome books available at www.indiegogo.com

story:
What's The Kraze?

The international K-Pop fandom is sorely lacking in printed magazines made just for them. Sure we can rely on translations of Korean magazine articles, but why isn't there a magazine made for a worldwide audience?

Well, that's where The Kraze comes in. Written and created by international fans, this magazine is dedicated to delivering the stories you want in an awesome print format. With all the latest news on comebacks, trends, charts and more, as well as sections on fashion, beauty and entertainment, The Kraze is made solely with  global K-Pop fans in mind.

Here's How You Can Help

Your support is crucial in making our launch a success. We're hoping to raise $500 leading up to the release of our first-ever issue at the beginning of June 2016. That may seem like a lot of money, but that's just 500 people around the world chipping in and buying a copy.

To help us raise the money so we can keep putting out a magazine every month, we're offering a few early bird incentives.

  • One Issue - Donate $1, get the June issue for $9 instead of $12 (Save $2)
  • 6 Issues - Donate $5, get a six-month subscription for $54 instead of $72 (Save $13)
  • 12 Issues - Donate $10, get a one-year subscription for $108 instead of $144 (Save $26)
A digital version of the magazine is available for free with the purchase of a print copy. In addition, we plan to have special goodies within each issue, so be sure to contribute and be a part of this new kraze!

Other Ways To Help

Spent all your extra cash on K-pop merch or concert tickets? We totally understand. Trust us, we've all been there. If you can't buy a copy of The Kraze now, there are other ways you can help us out that are absolutely free.

  • Follow us on Twitter and Facebook. Seeing and sharing our updates helps us spread the word to those who might not know about us yet.
  • Share this Indiegogo campaign with your friends, followers, classmates, next door neighbors. Whoever you can possibly share it with that loves K-pop.

story:
Resumen del proyecto

¡Hola! Soy Germán Bernardez, nací el 16 de Noviembre de 1984 en Montevideo, Uruguay, pero crecí en Málaga, España, donde hice mis primeras armas en el arte.

Escorpiano, futbolero, amante del helado y las playas, del café, las charlas de madrugada y la buena música, dediqué mi vida íntegramente a las artes, formándome en música, literatura, teatro, dibujo y humor.

En Málaga empecé a formarme en el teatro de títeres con el Maestro Titiritero Leopoldo Mérida, con quien adquirí herramientas para la producción de textos que sigo utilizando hasta el día de hoy.

Comencé a escribir estos cuentos hace diez años en un blog que, a través del anonimato, me permitía hablar de sexo y de fantasías sexuales, de situaciones extremas, de escenas que podrían ocurrirle a cualquier persona que leyera pero que quizás por el "que dirán" nunca probó. En dicho blog además sugiero con que tipo de café acompañar la lectura. Hoy, diez años después, decidí darle formato de libro a los mejores 50 cuentos del blog, en cinco categorías de café.

Desde hace algunos años estoy en charlas con distintas editoriales, de Uruguay, Argentina y España, compartiendo el borrador de mi libro y trabajando con las devoluciones obtenidas para corregirlo. Éste año Guillermo Bonjour me propuso realizar una campaña de crowdfunding para publicar el libro de forma autogestiva, lo que me pareció una gran idea que nos llevó a realizar este proyecto.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes 

Para lograrlo necesito conseguir tres mil dólares, los cuales invertiré en la publicación del libro, la edición de un video y la publicidad en redes sociales para promocionar el libro.

Tenemos exclusivas recompensas, como una edición virtual del libro que incluye una categoría de cuentos inéditos que no figuran en ningún otro lado, un set de café con una taza personalizada y un marcalibros, sesiones de lectura grupales e individuales, e incluso la posibilidad de pedirme que les escriba un cuento original y basado en sus propios deseos y fantasías, del cual uds serían los dueños.

En caso de no conseguir el 100% del financiamiento, recurriremos a un préstamo para publicar el libro igual, y cumplir con todas las recompensas obtenidas por los colaboradores. 

El impacto

A nivel personal, la realización de este proyecto significa la concreción de uno de los sueños más grandes de mi vida. El impacto es materializar un proceso de trabajo de diez años, y convertirlo en un libro lleno de cuentos intensos, provocativos y de lectura dinámica, que además está ilustrado por la artista y diseñadora española Patricia Castro Bohórquez, e incluye fotografías de la fotógrafa argentina Agostina Vilardo. 

En líneas generales, considero que el tipo de escritura, perspectiva y contenido que ofrece “Cuentos de Café Corto” invita a las personas que lo lean a dejarse llevar por las sensaciones, a charlar o leer en pareja sobre temas de sexualidad, a romper tabúes y prejuicios, a abrir la mente, a explorar y jugar. Creo en este libro y en su acción social como herramienta de transformación.  

Riesgos y desafíos 

Además de escritor, soy auxiliar en comunicación social y técnico en proyectos sociales, por lo que mi formación me dice que trabajando en equipo los obstáculos, riesgos y desafíos, se sortean o aprovechan de mayor forma y con mejores resultados. Estoy rodeado de un maravilloso y multidisciplinario equipo, con el que estamos comprometidos a llevar a cabo este proyecto a como dé lugar. Quienes nos acompañen en este camino no deben preocuparse por que lo que se les prometa se cumpla como corresponde. Este libro y sus recompensas estarán listas para Diciembre de 2016, si o si. 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar 

En caso de que no puedas aportar dinero en esta campaña, pero de igual forma quieras ayudar, puedes darnos una gran mano compartiendo este proyecto en las redes sociales y entre tus contactos personales, de forma de generar eco y que esta propuesta llegue a más gente alrededor del mundo. 

 

Muchas gracias,

 

Germán Bernardez y todo el equipo de “Cuentos de Café Corto”

story:
Boots and Cats is a rhythmic reader, a percussive primer, and a book that is sure to have you and your child bopping to a beat in no time! This imaginative board book uses simple sight words and pictures to build a catchy rhythm. Read aloud, echo back, clap along, change tempos, or even try removing the vowel sounds to experience all the fun this book has to offer.

  I recently wrote and illustrated this book for my kids.  I wanted to combine a basic method for teaching beatboxing (the "boots and cats" method) into a fun, easy-to-read kids book.  Now, I am so excited to share it with you and yours!  I am seeking support in raising $1500 to order a limited print run of this book.  That's where you come in!  Just $12* will get you a copy of this one-of-a-kind book (only $10* for the first 100 orders). 

  Also, during the course of this campaign, I will be creating trading-card sized Boots and Cats original pen/marker artwork.  I will be posting these online each day.  These mini-masterpieces will be included with a copy of the book at the $20 donation level, but be quick- there will only be 30 made!

  Thank you for taking the time to browse the campaign.  I hope you will show your support for this project and get a book or two to share with the important little ones in your life.  Please let me know in the comments if there is anything else you might like to see as part of this campaign or what future projects you might be interested in seeing from me.  

  Thank you!

--Eric

story:
A book written by myself (Valeriy Gristiv) and a professional ghostwriter about my Granny, Etcia Goldberg - a Ukrainian woman who lived in a deep underground cave (Popowa Yama) for 344 days protecting her three young children during the Holocaust.  It is also a love story that shares my Granny’s relationship with a Ukrainian shoemaker named Josef, who hid Jewish families on his property during the war.

Help us share Etcia Goldberg’s remarkable story about heroism, survival and woman’s empowerment that demonstrates that no matter how bad the circumstances there is always a way out.

My name is Valeriy Gristiv. As a young boy growing up in Borszcow, Ukraine half a century ago; my grandmother told me stories about what it meant to be Jewish in our country. She explained to me what it was like to hide in a cave 70 feet underground with my Momma, Mania; my uncles, Dunia and Marek, and four other large families during the Holocaust.

When my Granny told me these stories she said they never thought the world would believe the things that they did to survive. I am writing this book now because the world is now ready to hear it.

We are writing the story as a novel based on a true story to protect some of the characters identities; and to fill in some of the details of the cave experience shared by my Grandmother throughout my childhood, and by my Mother and uncles and other relatives when they were interviewed earlier the year for this book.  We feel an urgency to publish it now while my Mother and uncles are still alive to read it.

Following, please find a link to the radio podcast: bit.ly/jordanna. 

An article in Huntington Post: 

 http://www.huffingtonpost.com/danielle-wolffe/ukranian-jewish-womans-ho_b_6391170.html?utm_hp_ref=judaism


SAMPLES OF THE BOOK:

As I climb down the rungs of rock wall into the cave, the dawn light disappears from above me. I hold under my armpit the tattered bag of food and supplies I secured in the village, and finally let out my breath.

My legs are still slightly swollen from walking and running through the night. Relief spreads over my body and I leave it behind---the world above ground which has gone so crazy it is unrecognizable—where I may be welcomed to somebody’s table one minute, and have a gun pointed at my head the next.  I descend deeper into the fetid darkness, yearning for the love of my children, the only thing that makes any sense.

It is true that we live as the dead do, sealed so deep under the ground. Our bodies are part of the earth. In this deep cavern where the light has been snuffed out, we are free. They do not believe we exist here. And so we are left alone in peace.

I wind quickly down the corridors, counting my footsteps, feeling for rock walls like a blind woman. I hold the lantern up when I reach our living quarters and turn it on. My children are curled around each other under the dirty sheep skin blanket. For a brief second, they look more animal than human, small lumps of fur in a giant nest.

Marek sees me first and bolts up. Dunia and Mania turn slowly, their small eyes squinting. I place the bag of supplies on the rock table we made, collapse on the bed and open my arms.

They surround me, their chilled skin pressed against my sides. I squeeze them, breathing in their sourness; touching clumped hair, one small sticky hand gripping my thumb. My heartbeat is so loud, I am sure they can hear it. I remind myself that I am back home now, that my children are safe.

It sometimes takes me a long time both to readjust to the darkness, and to convince my body that we are all together again, that we still draw our breath.

Marek is the only one who still sobs when I return.  “We thought you weren’t coming back,” he says. Down here, we choose our words carefully. Marek is my baby. He is only seven years old but his words have the weight of heavy stone in a river. If I do not come back, he believes that nobody will take care of him or his siblings, that it is possible they will no longer be able to eat.

“Shhh,” says Mania, my 15-year-old daughter.  She reaches for her youngest brother, trying to take some of the burden from me.  I am reminded how much I worry for Mania. The women in my family all developed early: our full breasts and thighs a staple of our clan. Manias body is still prepubescent, her chest is flat and she is lanky, all hips and elbows and knees. I worry that her body will never mature; that she will never fall in love or raise her own family. At the same time, her eyes are lackluster, the eyes of an old woman who has seen too much and have stopped looking too far. In the cave, my Mania cannot dream like a girl.

I switch the lantern off. A deep shame burns in me. It is as if Mania knows. I visited Josef last night in his shoemakers shop, accepted the best bits of food that he had to give, even a jar of pickled carrots from his summer house. I was surprised by the way he appreciated me, despite the stench of my rotting tooth, my flesh that is fast turning to bone. When he touched my forehead, lightly, ignoring the grime I was sure I had not been able to wash in the latrine, I did not pull away. I have no right to be comforted like a woman when it is possible my daughter may not even live long enough to start menstruating.

I cannot afford to think this way.  We must survive.

“I will always come back for you,” I say. It is a prayer I tell them every few weeks when I leave the cave in my trousers to go beg or steal.

Sleep will come too easily.  The exhaustion is more urgent than hunger, than thirst. Our room down here is a sanctuary but it is also a trap. There is so much room here to walk around, unburdened by the terrors that haunt us above ground. At the same time the darkness has become somewhat of an infatuation, the way that we sleep through hunger and cold, lulling ourselves into a false sense of safety.

They know not to ask about food until morning, when it is our families turn again at the stove. I didn’t get as much food this time--some potatoes, grain, the carrots pickled in brine, we will have to eat less for longer.  I pull Marek onto my lap and prop myself up on the bed. Mania and Dunia gather at my sides. Mania touches my hair shyly, perhaps feeling in it the cool air of the night. She presses her lips to my cheek. They are eager for stories, my babies; they are anxious to know what the world is like aboveground. They want me to tell them fairytales about our family; about horses, and starlight and gardens.


THE TOP FIVE REASONS YOU MIGHT CHOOSE TO CONTRIBUTE TO THIS CAMPAIGN:

1. Survival: Anyone who has faced a tough challenge in life can benefit from this book. The cave dwellers lived in the dark and cold 70 feet underground, and learned ways to keep their bodies and minds active and alive despite the most extraordinary circumstances.

2. Gratitude:  My Grandmother’s story is peppered with the enormous gratitude she felt for all the people who helped her family and other cave dwellers to survive during the war. Throughout my childhood I watched my Grandmother repay this kindness to those who helped her and to anyone she encountered.

My Granny taught me so much about compassion, forgiveness and gratitude. We would be grateful if you would contribute to this campaign or share this campaign with others on social media. In return we will give you copies of the book and recognition in the book. You might also rest assured knowing that you are doing a good deed.  I know that seeing this book through to publication would make my Granny proud.

3. Women’s Empowerment:  The story of some of the other survivors of the cave was told in the documentary, The Secret of Priests Grotto, released in 2013. My Grandmother’s story was unique, as she was the only woman who was head of a household in the cave and risked her life regularly alongside the men--and independently of the men--to keep her children alive. Her story was not really shared in the film and my family feels it is important to share it now.

Etcia’s story can serve as an example to young women today. Etcia was a tough woman on her own who dressed in men’s clothes to disguise her identity, didn’t back down from the most extreme challenges; and did everything within her power to ensure her children survived.

4. Global Knowledge:

Galicia is a territory that straddles the Eastern Part of Poland and the Western Part of Ukraine. It is a beautiful land, characterized by its rich chernozem soil. Jewish people lived as a minority population in this area for 10-12 generations. They suffered throughout history under the rule of various leaders: however, devastation related to the European Holocaust practically annihilated the Jewish people in Galicia. My granny told stories to her children about the history of our people, our family and this colorful land throughout the novel.

5. Challenges: Although we found some small publishers willing to print our book, large publishers have told us the market is saturated with Holocaust books and so it is a harder sell. The printing process may take too long.  We would like the book to be published while my mother and uncles are still alive to read it. We are self-publishing the book to share a story which will contribute volumes to the lexicon of Holocaust literature and inspire young women today.

story:
Short Summary

  • I am Rabbi Dina-Hasida Mercy, a part-time Chaplain to Federal prisoners in the Pacific Region of Canada. 
  • I would like to raise funds to cover the costs of storing Harry's possessions until he has completed his sentence in June 2015. Harry is not his real name. He was successfully paroled: working and rebuilding his life when he was taken back to prison. Someone who looked like him was seen in a break-in video. He was never charged with that offence and now stands to lose all his possessions: including his tools that he needs to work on cars. I know him to be reformed and I am not permitted to just loan him the money.
  • Harry will be expected to pay back any money raised, which would then go into a fund available to chaplains for the supplies needed in prison chaplaincy.

What We Need & What You Get

 Storage costs are $405 each month. I would like to raise $2400 in donations to cover the next 6 months.

  •  The initial perk is helping Harry get back on his feet and later, as he repays, providing for the spiritual needs of prison inmates.  Spiritual care in prison helps inmates change themselves and prepare to re-enter society as positive contributors. They can't do it without help and support!
  • All funds that come in will go towards paying the storage fees or to prison chaplaincy needs. If not enough is raised, I will continue to seek donations to cover the costs until Harry is able to start paying back.

The Impact

  • Most prisoners are people who have made terrible mistakes in judgement with disastrous and harmful results. I am not excusing them, but it is in society's interests to help them reform so they can reenter society and become productive citizens. 
  • I have never done this before.
  • The spiritual needs that are unfunded include  all kinds of religious and spiritual books, communion hosts, prayer rugs, prayer shawls, etc. 

Risks & Challenges

  • I think it is hard for most people to feel any compassion for criminals. As a prison chaplain I have met people who are changing, who experience anguish over the pain they have caused others and who sincerely want to do better. My heart  breaks for the victims and families of victims. My heart also breaks for individuals who can never undo the harm they have caused.

Other Ways You Can Help

My spiritual tradition gives me the task to help repair the world. We are told that we must undertake the task even if we know we won't be able to complete it. I encourage everyone to find that bit of the world to work on!

  • Please let others know about this campaign even if you can't contribute.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
¿Qué?

Semillas de ceniza está dirigida a un amplio público sensibilizado con cuestiones sociales, en este caso con todo lo referente a educación, menores y los entresijos de las instituciones, así como a todos aquellos con inquietudes sociales y amantes de la novela negra.

En el ambiente opresivo, rígido y absolutamente controlado de un centro cerrado de menores, que se encuentran cumpliendo medidas judiciales, súbitamente se descubre la desaparición de uno de ellos. Una desaparición cargada de siniestras dudas e interrogantes. Porque nadie puede esfumarse sin más, sin dejar ningún tipo de rastro. ¿Se trata de una fuga? ¿Por qué entonces no hay indicios de cómo lo ha hecho? ¿Hay algo más oscuro tras esta desaparición?

Dos miembros del personal tratarán de descubrir qué ha sucedido realmente, entrelazando las historias de jóvenes atrapados por la violencia y la ira, así como la visión de veteranos educadores aferrados desesperadamente a lo que queda de sus principios y jóvenes idealistas que aún creen en cambiar la vida de los precoces delincuentes.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos al tándem Luis Moreno & Jesús Valbuena.

De Luis Moreno cabe destacar el haber sido incluido en diversas antologías (Tic Tac y Aldea Poética II), junto a nombres tan relevantes como Espido Freire, Luis Eduardo Aute, García Montero o Joaquín Sabina. También ha publicado el libro de poemas Agujas de Agua, así como las novelas Volveremos a ser Valientes  y desafiando al Huracán . Igualmente lleva más de diez años dedicado a la intervención social, fruto de la cual llega este testimonio sobre dicho ambiente de primera mano.

Por su parte, Jesús Valbuena es quizá uno de los periodistas más conocidos en el sur de Madrid, tanto en prensa escrita como en radio. Su trayectoria le ha llevado desde Radio Aranjuez Cadena SER y Onda Cero Aranjuez, como locutor radiofónico, a semanarios entre los que destacarían El Espejo de Aranjuez y su comarca y El Heraldo de Aranjuez como redactor, así como Información Al Día, en el puesto de Responsable de edición.

 Además de una prolífica trayectoria como relatista, destacan en su experiencia editorial sus textos para el libro 50 Años de Ferias y Fiestas de Aranjuez  y su libro de relatos El Último Duelo , cuya acogida tanto a nivel de crítica como de venta ha sido realmente favorable.

 La combinación de ambos ya fue premiada el pasado año en el IX Certamen de Creadores por la Libertad y la Paz, en su apartado de novela, con la obra Héroes de papel. En esta segunda ocasión, la colaboración cobra aún más fuerza y ritmo.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 800€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Semillas de ceniza que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Luis Moreno & Jesús Valbuena vean publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
My name is Ray Brown and I am on the verge of publishing my first children's book entitled "Kidtropolis". 

Kidtropolis tells the story of a young girl that journeys to a magical place to find out where babies come from. The books main character (which is based off my daughter) has Cerebral Palsy. But, though she has inabilities, she will soon discover that she can overcome them all, if she believes.  

This is book was originally scheduled to be released in the spring; but we have changed publishers and it will now be released in the early summer to bookshelves, everywhere.

But I need your help!  

I am asking you to help me raise the funds that I need to make this book a success.  While this book will be available in bookstores everywhere; I have an opportunity for it to be published as an ebook for the Kindle, Nook, and iPad, as well.

I need to raise just $3500 to make that happen.  So I am asking you for your support.  If you would donate $10.00 to this effort, you would be helping my dream come true.  And in return for that $10.00 donation, I will send you an autographed copy of the book once it is published.

Will you help me.  I would greatly appreciate, if you would.

Thank you advance,
Ray

story:
Background

My name is Katalin Galambos and I’ve been living in Norway for more than four years with my family consisting of two small kids. Both of my kids were born during our stay here and thus I have been lucky to experience Norway’s impressing family and child centric environment.

Being a mum is an everyday challenge and even more in a new society with different cultural background.  In order to manage the daily operational issues with your children and settle in, you need to put much more effort in finding your way, than if you were a local. There is so much information you need to know!

It began 3 years ago

Not being aware of any similar formation, after my first child was born I established an international mother group in Oslo (called IMOBAGO) to gather mums in similar situation and create a sharing and cooperation zone.

Road to the a book

Based on these mothers’ specific and custom-made questions, issues and best practices, I’ve identified the typical challenging areas for expat mothers in Oslo, grouped the relevant related information and now would like to make it available for an even larger group of mothers

  • the ones already living her,
  • the ones that are just arriving,
  • and the ones planning to move here

                                                   in the form of a book. 

The original intention was just to make a ‘light’ e-book but I eventually ended up with a much more comprehensive material. It is now 80-page long and broken into 9 chapters, each of them with useful and practical information.

Funds will cover the printing costs

The plan now is to have ~200 printed copies during the first quarter of 2013 followed by an e-book later on. The size of the printed version would be A5 which is the optimal size that can easily fit into a hand bag and be always within reach on the go.

THERE IS ALSO POSSIBILITY OF PRE-BOOKING A LIMITED NUMBER OF COPIES

Launch date

Launch date for the first batch of printed copies is set to be the international women's day (8th of March) or mother’s day (May, 12).

My sincere thanks to all those who took part in this project:

Coralie Denisey (co-writer), Zoe Harris (editor), Rita Vigovszky (graphic designer and illustrator), Kriszta Bödőcs (graphic designer), Polina Østenvig, Judy Ellis, Istvan Virag, Model Vralstad, Joy Contreras Henri, Suzy Winspear, Tiffany Cheng, Elena Koshman, Petra Abraham, Gro van Blerk.

and to YOU who believe in this project!

It is possible to make contributions already from $1!!!

Every penny is greatly appreciated and will be well used.

As a non working full time mother in Oslo i have dedicated extensive time to write this book but now need help with funds to get it printed.

Any contribution counts enormously towards my goal of giving a useful guide to those expat mums who raise or plan to raise kids in Norway.

On behalf of all the international mums living at this moment in Oslo I would like to thank those of you who choose to support us

Please accept my sincere thanks for believing in this project!

story:
Demand that President Obama release his College Transcripts and Passport Stamps!

Donald Trump has just released a video offering a deal to President Obama that if he release his college transcripts and passport stamps Trump will donate $5,000,000 to a charity of Obama's choice. I intend to raise enough money to match what Trump is offering and distribute the funds to the same charity of our Presidents choice.

My name is Bradley Palmer II and just like many of you for the past 4 years I have seen this country go in the wrong direction. We have 23 Million Americans out of work, your income has dropped by $4,000 a year, health insurance premiums have risen $2,500 dollars, and our country is over $16 Trillion dollars in debt. Where does this stop? Why do we have a President in office that claims to be the most transparent President in history yet refuses to release documents directly related to his eligibility to lead this country? We should demand more! We deserve better and from the pain we all have experienced over these last 4 years we need to question the man in charge. Would you allow your business or even just your checkbook to be run by an unqualified individual? My simple answer is no, but to prove he is not qualified we need your help! Donate to this cause. Should the President come through and comply with Trump we will donate the proceeds to the same charity of the President's choosing. Should he not comply with this deal we will donate to a local charity regardless of what Donald Trump does. $5,000,000 is a lot of money for Obama to not comply with. Imagine if that amount were $10,000,000.................AMERICA DESERVES TO KNOW!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • Should the President comply with the Trump deal your contributions will be donated to the charity of President Barak Obama's choosing.
 
  • Should the President not comply with the Trump deal your contributions will be donated to the Houston Food Bank to help those in need of food and shelter have someone to turn to. www.houstonfoodbank.org
 

The Impact

So you ask yourself; What difference will this make to me?

My answer is that it will keep the integrety of this country and our people in tact and away from influence at the highest levels of government running our lives when not qualified to do so.

Why should I give to this cause?

To increase the pressure on the President to release his records. Yes $5,000,000 from one man to a charity of the Presidents choosing is a lot, but $10,000,000 from thousands of individuals combined with Trumps contribution says a whole lot more!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Write to your local Congressman or Senator and demand that they ask for these records.
  • Share this link with your friends who may be able to help!!!
  • Call your local news or radio station and let them know about this cause!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jonah Estess. I am a senior at the NYC iSchool in Lower Manhattan. One of the graduation requirements is to complete a project on a topic of my choice, and so I have chosen to produce an exhibit and give a formal presentation to a group of my peers. The topic I will concentrate on is the history and explanations for the existence of American Civil War tokens, which were produced by merchants in response to the massive hoarding of legal tender coinage in circulation just after the start of the Civil War. This is an extremely important project to me, not only because of its importance for my graduation, but because numismatics - the study of coins, medals, paper money, and other economy-related artifacts - is my passion and is what I hope to continue for the rest of my academic and professional careers. If you chose to contribute to this project, you will be helping me accomplish the largest academic project I have ever undertaken.

What We Need & What You Get

My campaign goal is to raise at least $800 to purchase all of the presentation and curatorial materials needed to produce a quality exhibit. Every bit of the money raised will go into the making of the exhibit. As a contributor, I cannot offer you money or prizes or a chance at the vacation of your life, but I will remain forever grateful for you help with my project. After I display my exhibit and orate my presentation, I will provide a full-length video of my exhibit and presentation online for anyone to see.

The Impact

Your contributions are a decisive factor in the completion and effectiveness of my exhibit and presentation. I have devoted much of my life to learning about numismatics and its significance in the world today. Although I have never completed a project of this size before, I spent two and a half years of high school as an intern in the American Numismatic Society's curatorial department. Here, I worked with historians and scholars to catalogue parts of the Society's collection. I also assisted in organizing parts of the collection and working with curators to assemble pieces of the collection for their projects and other academic works. I am also experienced in organizing numismatic auctions with groups of my peers at the American Numismatic Association's annual Summer Seminar at their headquarters in Colorado Springs, CO.

Every contribution you make to towards my project will help me reach my ultimate goal of making numismatics, economic, and social history my profession.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute to my campaign, I encourage you to check out the two organizations that I mentioned above:

American Numismatic Association: http://www.money.org/

American Numismatic Society: http://www.numismatics.org/

A third organization that has contributed immensley to the study of Civil War tokens is the Civil War Token Society. Check out their website here: http://www.cwtsociety.com/

Both of these organizations are at the forefront of historical research, analysis, and education and are organizations to which I owe much of my devotion to the numismatic field.

Thank you for taking the time to learn about my project!

Happy Holidays!

This is an extremely important project to me, not only because of its importance for my graduation, but because numismatics - the study of coins, medals, paper money, and other economy-related artifacts - is my passion and is what I hope to continue for the rest of my academic and professional careers. If you chose to contribute to this project, you will be helping me accomplish the largest academic project I have ever undertaken.


What We Need & What You Get
My campaign goal is to raise at least $800 to purchase all of the presentation and curatorial materials needed to produce a quality exhibit. Every bit of the money raised will go into the making of the exhibit. As a contributor, I cannot offer you money or prizes or a chance at the vacation of your life, but I will remain forever grateful for you help with my project. After I display my exhibit and orate my presentation, I will provide a full-length video of my exhibit and presentation online for anyone to see.


The Impact
Your contributions are a decisive factor in the completion and effectiveness of my exhibit and presentation. I have devoted much of my life to learning about numismatics and its significance in the world today. Although I have never completed a project of this size before, I spent two and a half years of high school as an intern in the American Numismatic Society's curatorial department. Here, I worked with historians and scholars to catalogue parts of the Society's collection. I also assisted in organizing parts of the collection and working with curators to assemble pieces of the collection for their projects and other academic works. I am also experienced in organizing numismatic auctions with groups of my peers at the American Numismatic Association's annual Summer Seminar at their headquarters in Colorado Springs, CO.
Every contribution you make to towards my project will help me reach my ultimate goal of making numismatics, economic, and social history my profession.


Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't contribute to my campaign, I encourage you to check out the two organizations that I mentioned above:
American Numismatic Association: http://www.money.org/
American Numismatic Society: http://www.numismatics.org/
A third organization that has contributed immensley to the study of Civil War tokens is the Civil War Token Society. Check out their website here: http://www.cwtsociety.com/
Both of these organizations are at the forefront of historical research, analysis, and education and are organizations to which I owe much of my devotion to the numismatic field.
Thank you for taking the time to learn about my project!
Happy Holidays!

Project Summary:

US Army AWOL Defense: A Practice Guide will be published in December 2012, in both print and ebook formats.

The book is a legal practice guide (a practical "how-to" book for attorneys and other legal professionals) on how to help AWOL (absent without leave) soldiers get their legal situations resolved in the best way possible. The book will include not only commentary, but also will provide sample letters, forms and other documents that could be useful in the art of AWOL defense.

Along with the practical elements, the book will also touch briefly on some of the historical, social, moral and legal issues related to the issue of AWOL in the US military.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Excerpt from the first draft of the book:

“Soldiers who desert their units are ruining their lives. They normally wind up with years of jail time, and a dishonorable discharge. In fact they are getting off easy because desertion in time of war is punishable by death!” - Statement by an unnamed basic training drill sergeant

“If you want to go AWOL, go right ahead. If you don't want to be here, the Army doesn't want you. Just follow the train tracks off post. Just get the **** out of here! Hell, we'll even mail you your discharge papers.” - Statement by a different unnamed sergeant

These two statements are examples of the over-simplified rumors that members of the US Army hear on a regular basis. I've heard both of these statements (and variations on those statements) repeated by my clients, which added a great deal of confusion to an already difficult situation. I believe that it is better for soldiers to know the whole truth about how AWOL cases are handled in the Army. This book is intended to help to tell the real story.

About the author:

James M. Branum is a civilian lawyer who has practiced military/GI Rights law for almost 6 years. He has represented dozens of war resisters and conscientious objectors (as well as hundreds of other soldiers) during that time at more than a 20 posts nation-wide to date, as well as before military appellate courts and administrative boards.

Notable clients have included Robin Long (the first US soldier to flee to Canada during the current wars to later be deported), Travis Bishop and Victor Agosto (some of the first US soldiers to refuse to deploy to Afghanistan).

Besides his legal work, the author has conducted seminars for a variety of audiences including continuing legal education for attorneys, trainings for paralegal GI rights counselors, and presentations to churches and community groups.

The author currently is the Legal Director of the Oklahoma Center for Conscience and Peace Research and is the Minister of Peace & Justice at Joy Mennonite Church. He is also a past Chair of the Military Law Task Force of the National Lawyers Guild.

A full C.V. of the author can be found at: http://jmbranum.com/cv/cv.pdf

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Project Goals:

The first draft of the book is finished. Editing is underway with a goal of having it ready for publishing in December 2012. 

The book will be published in 2 formats:

* Traditional print paperback (sold at a reasonable cost)

* E-book to be read on e-readers and computers (sold at a reasonable cost)

The book will initially be available for free digital download to active duty servicemembers in need, subject to the success of fundraising for the project.

The book will first be published through a POD (print on demand) service like Lulu or CreateSpace, to ensure the book gets into the hands of those in need as quickly as possible. 

Project Purposes:

1. To provide practical information for military law practitioners (and their clients) on legal strategies used to deal with possible absence-related offenses under the Uniform Code of Military Justice (i.e. AWOL, Desertion and Missing Movement),

2. To provide sample letters, forms and other documents to military law practitioners who area working with AWOL soldiers,

3. To provide hope and encouragement to military servicemembers who are seeking to resolve their AWOL status with the Army.

Project fundraising needs:

The funds raised through this kickstarter project will be used for 3 things:

1. To pay the author for his time in writing, editing and publishing this book

2. To fulfill the Kickstarter rewards

3. To provide free copies of the book to active duty servicemembers

4. For book publishing/promotion costs.

The Indiegogo campaign goal is the minimum amount required to publish the book. Funds raised raised beyond this minimum will help to fund additional promotion of the book, as well as future writing efforts (a second book is in the works), however, if the campaign does not reach its goal I will seek alternate funding so the book can make it to print.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Perks for Donors:

A full listing of perks provided to donors can be found on this page. Please note the following:

Print books will be shipped to US addresses at no extra charge. International shipping can also be done, but please in  chip in extra to cover the extra costs. Contact girightslawyer@gmail.com for details.

Donations are NOT tax deductible.

The Major Underwriter package is subject to approval by the author. Please contact girightslawyer@gmail.com for details.

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can't give money, you can still help this project be a reality. Some ways to help include: 

  • Get the word out on your facebook wall, on a blog, or on twitter.
  • Tell others about the project.
  • Buy a copy of the book when it is in print.
